DataListSpec.Name: Child Project Transferred Children Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Data list to show a list of transferred children on the child project page.
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CHILDPROJECT_CHILDRENLIST_TRANSFERRED( @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, @CHILDLOOKUPID nvarchar(100) = null, @CHILDNAME nvarchar(200) = null ) as begin set nocount on;
select slocation.FIELDOFFICEID, so.ID SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, so.LOOKUPID CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME, ch_transfer.FROMREGISTRATIONDATE, ch_transfer.CRMDATEOFTRANSFER, so_child.AGE, so_child.GENDER, dbo.UFN_DATE_FROMFUZZYDATE (so_child.BIRTHDATE) BIRTHDATE
from dbo.USR_CHILDTRANSFER ch_transfer inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on ch_transfer.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on ch_transfer.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so_child.ID left join dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION ch_ext on so_child.ID = ch_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation ON slocation.ID = ch_transfer.FROMPROJECTID
where FIELDOFFICEID = @CONTEXTID and (@CHILDLOOKUPID is null or so.LOOKUPID like '%' + @CHILDLOOKUPID + '%') and (@CHILDNAME is null or so_child.NAME like '%' + @CHILDNAME + '%')
end
